column4: hey guys wonder if you could help, I'm having trouble connecting through ssh to my ubuntu server
first time using ubuntu server, no gui. ive set up LAMP, but cant seem to connect remotly using SSH on a local network
Possibly the server is setup for DHCP and you'll have to find the IP address in order to connect?
Right - then it appears as though your ssh either isn't installed or setup; however, have you tried to just telnet into it? Did you install telnet?
